CI = 0.18 × CD ($632k); includes site supervision; temporary facilities; HSE; QA/QC field inspection; construction management; small tools; per fallback typical model
P = 0.02 × MAT ($675k); includes material sourcing; PO processing; vendor coordination; expediting; receiving inspection; material documentation; per fallback typical model
PM = 0.06 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1421k); includes project management; engineering management; schedule/cost control; contract administration; stakeholder coordination; per fallback typical model

COM = 0.03 × (CD + CI + MAT) ($1421k); includes HVAC TAB; plumbing pressure testing; fire sprinkler hydrostatic/flow testing per NFPA 13; electrical testing; functional performance testing; owner training; per fallback typical model
